title: Blue Essence
body: I can't figure out how to get blue essence in the new preseason. I've played about 3 games but I haven't gotten anything. I used to get IP for every game I played, but now I'm not getting anything. can someone plz help me?

replies.body: You don't get blue essence on a normal basis after each game, but now each time you level up you get a capsule which can have multiple champion shards and even some flat essence at certain levels. You can also still disenchant any unneeded champion shards for BE.
Wow what a grind! This system is shit.
Was a grind in the old system as well.
ya gotta buy rp for champs now. The days of free content is over
riot changed how it works, now they pretty much force you to buy champs, you earn blue essence super slow from leveling and disenchanting. Just another money grab from riot.
